title: The Ten Steps to Journaling: How to Start a Journal or Diary
description: Thereâ€™s something about picking up your first journal and writing down in ink your first entry. And, from then on out, the feeling never goes away.  A. C. Zito's momentous book dives into the wonders of journaling, and how you'll be able to start a journal or diary in no time. Zito dives into questions like:  *How to pick up the pen? *How to create a lasting habit? *How to write with no limit? *What techniques do I need to know to start a journal or diary?  Zito goes into many techniques and tricks when writing in your journal or diary. He gives pointers and life lessons of why this writing power you will learn about will come in handy in life. Zito will help you in this book to discover the truths of how writing will help you now and forever.
author: A.C. Zito
